code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import io from"socket.io-client";var SocketSlice=createSlice({name:"socket",initialState:{},reducers:{getSocketStatus:function getSocketStatus(state,action){var socket=io("https://chat-web-vz9a.onrender.com",{transports:['websocket','polling','flashsocket']});socket.emit("addUser",action.payload.userId);state={socket:socket};console.log(state);return state;}}});var getSocketStatus=SocketSlice.actions.getSocketStatus;export{getSocketStatus};export default SocketSlice.reducer;
